contents.text: After sending a Destination Announce Response Message containing a Status Data Item with a status code of 0 'Success', a modem then announces changes to the link to the destination via Destination Update Messages.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送包含状态代码为0“Success”的状态数据项的目标公告响应消息后，调制解调器通过目标更新消息宣布对目标链接的更改。

contents.text: When a successful Destination Announce Response Message is received, the router should add knowledge of the available destination to its information base.
contents.zh-CHS: 当接收到成功的目的地通告响应消息时，路由器应将可用目的地的知识添加到其信息库中。

contents.text: 12.15. Destination Down Message
contents.zh-CHS: 12.15. 目的地停机消息

contents.text: A modem MUST send a Destination Down Message to report when a destination (a remote node or a multicast group) is no longer reachable.
contents.zh-CHS: 当目标（远程节点或多播组）不再可访问时，调制解调器必须发送目标关闭消息以报告。

contents.text: A router MAY send a Destination Down Message to report when it no longer requires information concerning a destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 当路由器不再需要关于目的地的信息时，它可以发送目的地关闭消息以进行报告。

contents.text: To construct a Destination Down Message, the Message Type value in the Message Header is set to 11 (see "Message Type Registration" (Section 15.3)).
contents.zh-CHS: 要构造目的地下行消息，消息头中的消息类型值设置为11（请参阅“消息类型注册”（第15.3节））。

contents.text: The Destination Down Message MUST contain a MAC Address Data Item (Section 13.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 目标停机消息必须包含MAC地址数据项（第13.7节）。

contents.text: It should be noted that both modem and router may send a Destination Down Message to their peer, regardless of which participant initially indicated the destination to be 'up'.
contents.zh-CHS: 应该注意的是，调制解调器和路由器都可以向其对等方发送目的地下行消息，而不管哪个参与者最初将目的地指示为“上行”。

contents.text: 12.16. Destination Down Response Message
contents.zh-CHS: 12.16. 目的地停机响应消息

contents.text: A Destination Down Response Message MUST be sent by the recipient of a Destination Down Message (Section 12.15) to confirm that the relevant data concerning the destination has been removed from the information base.
contents.zh-CHS: 目的地停机响应消息必须由目的地停机消息的接收者发送（第12.15节），以确认与目的地相关的数据已从信息库中删除。

contents.text: To construct a Destination Down Response Message, the Message Type value in the Message Header is set to 12 (see "Message Type Registration" (Section 15.3)).
contents.zh-CHS: 为了构造目的地下行响应消息，将消息头中的消息类型值设置为12（请参阅“消息类型注册”（第15.3节））。

contents.text: The Destination Down Response Message MUST contain one of each of the following Data Items:
contents.zh-CHS: 目标停机响应消息必须包含以下每个数据项之一：

contents.text: o MAC Address (Section 13.7)
contents.zh-CHS: o MAC地址（第13.7节）

contents.text: o Status (Section 13.1)
contents.zh-CHS: o 状态（第13.1节）

contents.text: 12.17. Destination Update Message
contents.zh-CHS: 12.17. 目的地更新消息

contents.text: A modem SHOULD send a Destination Update Message when it detects some change in the information base for a given destination (remote node or multicast group). Some examples of changes that would prompt a Destination Update Message are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 当调制解调器检测到给定目的地（远程节点或多播组）的信息库发生变化时，应发送目的地更新消息。提示目标更新消息的一些更改示例如下：

contents.text: o Change in link metrics (e.g., data rates)
contents.zh-CHS: o 链路指标的变化（例如，数据速率）

contents.text: o Layer 3 addressing change
contents.zh-CHS: o 第3层寻址更改

contents.text: To construct a Destination Update Message, the Message Type value in the Message Header is set to 13 (see "Message Type Registration" (Section 15.3)).
contents.zh-CHS: 要构造目的地更新消息，消息头中的消息类型值设置为13（请参阅“消息类型注册”（第15.3节））。

contents.text: The Destination Update Message MUST contain a MAC Address Data Item (Section 13.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 目标更新消息必须包含MAC地址数据项（第13.7节）。

contents.text: The Destination Update Message MAY contain one of each of the following Data Items:
contents.zh-CHS: 目标更新消息可能包含以下数据项之一：

contents.text: o Maximum Data Rate (Receive) (Section 13.12)
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大数据速率（接收）（第13.12节）

contents.text: o Maximum Data Rate (Transmit) (Section 13.13)
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大数据速率（传输）（第13.13节）

contents.text: o Current Data Rate (Receive) (Section 13.14)
contents.zh-CHS: o 当前数据速率（接收）（第13.14节）

contents.text: o Current Data Rate (Transmit) (Section 13.15)
contents.zh-CHS: o 当前数据速率（传输）（第13.15节）

contents.text: o Latency (Section 13.16)
contents.zh-CHS: o 延迟（第13.16节）

contents.text: The Destination Update Message MAY contain one of each of the following Data Items, if the Data Item is in use by the session:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果会话正在使用数据项，则目标更新消息可能包含以下数据项之一：

contents.text: o Resources (Section 13.17)
contents.zh-CHS: o 资源（第13.17节）

contents.text: o Relative Link Quality (Receive) (Section 13.18)
contents.zh-CHS: o 相对链路质量（接收）（第13.18节）

contents.text: o Relative Link Quality (Transmit) (Section 13.19)
contents.zh-CHS: o 相对链路质量（传输）（第13.19节）

contents.text: o Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) (Section 13.20)
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大传输单位（MTU）（第13.20节）

contents.text: The Destination Update Message MAY contain one or more of each of the following Data Items, with different values:
contents.zh-CHS: 目标更新消息可能包含以下每个数据项中的一个或多个，具有不同的值：

contents.text: o IPv4 Address (Section 13.8)
contents.zh-CHS: o IPv4地址（第13.8节）

contents.text: o IPv6 Address (Section 13.9)
contents.zh-CHS: o IPv6地址（第13.9节）

contents.text: o IPv4 Attached Subnet (Section 13.10)
contents.zh-CHS: o IPv4连接的子网（第13.10节）

contents.text: o IPv6 Attached Subnet (Section 13.11)
contents.zh-CHS: o IPv6连接子网（第13.11节）

contents.text: Metrics supplied in this Message overwrite metrics provided in a previously received Session Message, Destination Message, or Link Characteristics Message (e.g., Session Initialization, Destination Up, Link Characteristics Response).
contents.zh-CHS: 此消息中提供的度量覆盖先前接收到的会话消息、目标消息或链路特性消息（例如，会话初始化、目标向上、链路特性响应）中提供的度量。

contents.text: It should be noted that this Message has no corresponding response.
contents.zh-CHS: 应注意，此消息没有相应的响应。

contents.text: 12.18. Link Characteristics Request Message
contents.zh-CHS: 12.18. 链路特性请求消息

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Request Message MAY be sent by a router to request that the modem initiate changes for specific characteristics of the link. The request can reference either a real destination (e.g., a remote node) or a logical destination (e.g., a multicast group) within the network.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性请求消息可由路由器发送，以请求调制解调器针对链路的特定特性发起更改。请求可以引用网络内的真实目的地（例如，远程节点）或逻辑目的地（例如，多播组）。

contents.text: To construct a Link Characteristics Request Message, the Message Type value in the Message Header is set to 14 (see "Message Type Registration" (Section 15.3)).
contents.zh-CHS: 为了构造链路特性请求消息，消息头中的消息类型值设置为14（参见“消息类型注册”（第15.3节））。

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Request Message MUST contain a MAC Address Data Item (Section 13.7).
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性请求消息必须包含MAC地址数据项（第13.7节）。

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Request Message MUST also contain at least one of each of the following Data Items:
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性请求消息还必须至少包含以下每个数据项中的一个：

contents.text: o Current Data Rate (Receive) (Section 13.14)
contents.zh-CHS: o 当前数据速率（接收）（第13.14节）

contents.text: o Current Data Rate (Transmit) (Section 13.15)
contents.zh-CHS: o 当前数据速率（传输）（第13.15节）

contents.text: o Latency (Section 13.16)
contents.zh-CHS: o 延迟（第13.16节）

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Request Message MAY contain either a Current Data Rate (Receive) (CDRR) or Current Data Rate (Transmit) (CDRT) Data Item to request a different data rate than is currently allocated, a Latency Data Item to request that traffic delay on the link not exceed the specified value, or both.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性请求消息可以包含用于请求不同于当前分配的数据速率的当前数据速率（接收）（CDRR）或当前数据速率（传输）（CDRT）数据项、用于请求链路上的业务延迟不超过指定值的延迟数据项，或者两者都包含。

contents.text: The router sending a Link Characteristics Request Message should be aware that a request may take an extended period of time to complete.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送链路特性请求消息的路由器应该知道，请求可能需要较长的时间才能完成。

contents.text: 12.19. Link Characteristics Response Message
contents.zh-CHS: 12.19. 链路特性响应消息

contents.text: A modem MUST send a Link Characteristics Response Message when a Link Characteristics Request Message (Section 12.18) is received.
contents.zh-CHS: 当收到链路特性请求消息（第12.18节）时，调制解调器必须发送链路特性响应消息。

contents.text: To construct a Link Characteristics Response Message, the Message Type value in the Message Header is set to 15 (see "Message Type Registration" (Section 15.3)).
contents.zh-CHS: 为了构造链路特性响应消息，消息头中的消息类型值设置为15（参见“消息类型注册”（第15.3节））。

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Response Message MUST contain one of each of the following Data Items:
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性响应消息必须包含以下数据项之一：

contents.text: o MAC Address (Section 13.7)
contents.zh-CHS: o MAC地址（第13.7节）

contents.text: o Status (Section 13.1)
contents.zh-CHS: o 状态（第13.1节）

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Response Message SHOULD contain one of each of the following Data Items:
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性响应消息应包含以下数据项之一：

contents.text: o Maximum Data Rate (Receive) (Section 13.12)
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大数据速率（接收）（第13.12节）

contents.text: o Maximum Data Rate (Transmit) (Section 13.13)
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大数据速率（传输）（第13.13节）

contents.text: o Current Data Rate (Receive) (Section 13.14)
contents.zh-CHS: o 当前数据速率（接收）（第13.14节）

contents.text: o Current Data Rate (Transmit) (Section 13.15)
contents.zh-CHS: o 当前数据速率（传输）（第13.15节）

contents.text: o Latency (Section 13.16)
contents.zh-CHS: o 延迟（第13.16节）

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Response Message MAY contain one of each of the following Data Items, if the Data Item is in use by the session:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果会话正在使用数据项，则链路特性响应消息可以包含以下每个数据项中的一个：

contents.text: o Resources (Section 13.17)
contents.zh-CHS: o 资源（第13.17节）

contents.text: o Relative Link Quality (Receive) (Section 13.18)
contents.zh-CHS: o 相对链路质量（接收）（第13.18节）

contents.text: o Relative Link Quality (Transmit) (Section 13.19)
contents.zh-CHS: o 相对链路质量（传输）（第13.19节）

contents.text: o Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) (Section 13.20)
contents.zh-CHS: o 最大传输单位（MTU）（第13.20节）

contents.text: The Link Characteristics Response Message MUST contain a complete set of metric Data Items, referencing all metrics declared in the Session Initialization Response Message (Section 12.6). The values in the metric Data Items in the Link Characteristics Response Message MUST reflect the link characteristics after the request has been processed.
contents.zh-CHS: 链路特性响应消息必须包含一整套度量数据项，引用会话初始化响应消息（第12.6节）中声明的所有度量。链路特性响应消息中度量数据项中的值必须反映处理请求后的链路特性。

contents.text: If an implementation is not able to alter the characteristics of the link in the manner requested, then the status code of the Status Data Item MUST be set to 2 'Request Denied'; see Table 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果实现无法以请求的方式改变链路的特性，则状态数据项的状态代码必须设置为2“请求被拒绝”；见表2。

contents.text: 12.20. Heartbeat Message
contents.zh-CHS: 12.20. 心跳信息

contents.text: A Heartbeat Message MUST be sent by a DLEP participant every N milliseconds, where N is defined in the Heartbeat Interval Data Item (Section 13.5) of the Session Initialization Message (Section 12.5) or Session Initialization Response Message (Section 12.6).
contents.zh-CHS: DLEP参与者必须每N毫秒发送一次心跳消息，其中N在会话初始化消息（第12.5节）或会话初始化响应消息（第12.6节）的心跳间隔数据项（第13.5节）中定义。

contents.text: To construct a Heartbeat Message, the Message Type value in the Message Header is set to 16 (see "Message Type Registration" (Section 15.3)).
contents.zh-CHS: 要构造心跳消息，消息头中的消息类型值设置为16（请参阅“消息类型注册”（第15.3节））。

contents.text: There are no valid Data Items for the Heartbeat Message.
contents.zh-CHS: 检测信号消息没有有效的数据项。

contents.text: The Heartbeat Message is used by DLEP participants to detect when a DLEP session peer (either the modem or the router) is no longer communicating; see Section 7.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: DLEP参与者使用心跳消息来检测DLEP会话对等方（调制解调器或路由器）何时不再通信；见第7.3.1节。

contents.text: 13. DLEP Data Items
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 数据项

contents.text: The core DLEP Data Items are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 核心DLEP数据项如下所示：

contents.text:

+-------------+-----------------------------------------------------+

|             |                                                     |
| 1           | Status (Section 13.1)                               |
|             |                                                     |
| 2           | IPv4 Connection Point (Section 13.2)                |
|             |                                                     |
| 3           | IPv6 Connection Point (Section 13.3)                |
|             |                                                     |
| 4           | Peer Type (Section 13.4)                            |
|             |                                                     |
| 5           | Heartbeat Interval (Section 13.5)                   |
|             |                                                     |
| 6           | Extensions Supported (Section 13.6)                 |
|             |                                                     |
| 7           | MAC Address (Section 13.7)                          |
|             |                                                     |
| 8           | IPv4 Address (Section 13.8)                         |
|             |                                                     |
| 9           | IPv6 Address (Section 13.9)                         |
|             |                                                     |
| 10          | IPv4 Attached Subnet (Section 13.10)                |
|             |                                                     |
| 11          | IPv6 Attached Subnet (Section 13.11)                |

| 12          | Maximum Data Rate (Receive) (MDRR) (Section 13.12)  |

Table 1: DLEP Data Item Types
contents.zh-CHS: 表1:DLEP数据项类型

contents.text: 13.1. Status

For the Session Termination Message (Section 12.9), the Status Data Item indicates a reason for the termination. For all response messages, the Status Data Item is used to indicate the success or failure of the previously received Message.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于会话终止消息（第12.9节），状态数据项表示终止的原因。对于所有响应消息，状态数据项用于指示先前接收的消息的成功或失败。

contents.text: The Status Data Item includes an optional Text field that can be used to provide a textual description of the status. The use of the Text field is entirely up to the receiving implementation, e.g., it could be output to a log file or discarded. If no Text field is supplied with the Status Data Item, the Length field MUST be set to 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态数据项包括可选的文本字段，可用于提供状态的文本描述。文本字段的使用完全取决于接收实现，例如，它可以输出到日志文件或被丢弃。如果状态数据项未提供文本字段，则长度字段必须设置为1。

contents.text: The Status Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 状态数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：1

contents.text: Length: 1 + Length of Text, in octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1+文本长度，以八位字节为单位。

contents.text: Status Code: One of the status codes defined in Table 2 below.
contents.zh-CHS: 状态代码：下表2中定义的状态代码之一。

contents.text: Text: UTF-8 encoded string of Unicode [RFC3629] characters, describing the cause, used for implementation-defined purposes. Since this field is used for description purposes, implementations SHOULD limit characters in this field to printable characters.
contents.zh-CHS: Text:Unicode[RFC3629]字符的UTF-8编码字符串，描述原因，用于实现定义的目的。由于此字段用于描述目的，因此实现应将此字段中的字符限制为可打印字符。

contents.text: An implementation MUST NOT assume that the Text field is a NUL-terminated string of printable characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现不能假定文本字段是以NUL结尾的可打印字符字符串。

contents.text:
+----------+-------------+------------------+-----------------------+
| Status   | Failure     | Description      | Reason                |
| Code     | Mode        |                  |                       |
+----------+-------------+------------------+-----------------------+
| 0        | Continue    | Success          | The Message was       |
|          |             |                  | processed             |
|          |             |                  | successfully.         |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 1        | Continue    | Not Interested   | The receiver is not   |
|          |             |                  | interested in this    |
|          |             |                  | Message subject,      |
|          |             |                  | e.g., in a            |
|          |             |                  | Destination Up        |
|          |             |                  | Response Message      |
|          |             |                  | (Section 12.12) to    |
|          |             |                  | indicate no further   |
|          |             |                  | Messages about the    |
|          |             |                  | destination.          |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 2        | Continue    | Request Denied   | The receiver refuses  |
|          |             |                  | to complete the       |
|          |             |                  | request.              |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 3        | Continue    | Inconsistent     | One or more Data      |
|          |             | Data             | Items in the Message  |
|          |             |                  | describe a logically  |
|          |             |                  | inconsistent state in |
|          |             |                  | the network -- for    |
|          |             |                  | example, in the       |
|          |             |                  | Destination Up        |
|          |             |                  | Message               |
|          |             |                  | (Section 12.11) when  |
|          |             |                  | an announced subnet   |
|          |             |                  | clashes with an       |
|          |             |                  | existing destination  |
|          |             |                  | subnet.               |
|          |             |                  |                       |

| 4-111    | Continue    | <Unassigned>     | Available for future  |
|          |             |                  | extensions.           |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 112-127  | Continue    | <Reserved for    | Available for         |
|          |             | Private Use>     | experiments.          |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 128      | Terminate   | Unknown Message  | The Message was not   |
|          |             |                  | recognized by the     |
|          |             |                  | implementation.       |
|          |             |                  |                       |

|          |             | Message          | expected while the    |

|          |             |                  | current state, e.g.,  |
|          |             |                  | a Session             |
|          |             |                  | Initialization        |
|          |             |                  | Message               |
|          |             |                  | (Section 12.5) in     |
|          |             |                  | the In-Session state. |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 130      | Terminate   | Invalid Data     | One or more Data      |
|          |             |                  | Items in the Message  |
|          |             |                  | are invalid,          |
|          |             |                  | unexpected, or        |
|          |             |                  | incorrectly           |

|          |             |                  |                       |

|          |             | Destination      | included in the       |
|          |             |                  | Message does not      |

|          |             |                  | announced destination |
|          |             |                  | -- for example, in    |
|          |             |                  | the Link              |

|          |             |                  | (Section 12.19).      |
|          |             |                  |                       |
| 132      | Terminate   | Timed Out        | The session has       |
|          |             |                  | timed out.            |
|          |             |                  |                       |

|          |             |                  |                       |

Table 2: DLEP Status Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 表2:DLEP状态代码

contents.text: 13.2. IPv4 Connection Point
contents.zh-CHS: 13.2. IPv4连接点

contents.text: The IPv4 Connection Point Data Item indicates the IPv4 address and, optionally, the TCP port number on the modem available for connections. If provided, the router MUST use this information to initiate the TCP connection to the modem.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4连接点数据项表示IPv4地址以及调制解调器上可用于连接的TCP端口号（可选）。如果提供，路由器必须使用此信息启动到调制解调器的TCP连接。

contents.text: The IPv4 Connection Point Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4连接点数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：2

contents.text: Length: 5 (or 7 if TCP Port Number included).
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：5（如果包含TCP端口号，则为7）。

contents.text: Flags: Flags field, defined below.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志：标志字段，定义如下。

contents.text: IPv4 Address: The IPv4 address listening on the modem.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4地址：在调制解调器上侦听的IPv4地址。

contents.text: TCP Port Number: TCP port number on the modem.
contents.zh-CHS: TCP端口号：调制解调器上的TCP端口号。

contents.text: If the Length field is 7, the port number specified MUST be used to establish the TCP session. If the TCP Port Number is omitted, i.e., the Length field is 5, the router MUST use the DLEP well-known port number (Section 15.14) to establish the TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果长度字段为7，则必须使用指定的端口号来建立TCP会话。如果省略TCP端口号，即长度字段为5，则路由器必须使用DLEP已知端口号（第15.14节）来建立TCP连接。

contents.text: The Flags field is defined as:
contents.zh-CHS: 标志字段定义为：

contents.text: T: Use TLS flag, indicating whether the TCP connection to the given address and port requires the use of TLS [RFC5246] (1) or not (0).
contents.zh-CHS: T:使用TLS标志，指示到给定地址和端口的TCP连接是否需要使用TLS[RFC5246]（1）或（0）。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be zero. Left for future assignment.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须为零。留作将来的任务。

contents.text: 13.3. IPv6 Connection Point
contents.zh-CHS: 13.3. IPv6连接点

contents.text: The IPv6 Connection Point Data Item indicates the IPv6 address and, optionally, the TCP port number on the modem available for connections. If provided, the router MUST use this information to initiate the TCP connection to the modem.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv6连接点数据项表示IPv6地址以及调制解调器上可用于连接的TCP端口号（可选）。如果提供，路由器必须使用此信息启动到调制解调器的TCP连接。

contents.text: The IPv6 Connection Point Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: IPv6连接点数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 3
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：3

contents.text: Length: 17 (or 19 if TCP Port Number included).
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：17（如果包含TCP端口号，则为19）。

contents.text: Flags: Flags field, defined below.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志：标志字段，定义如下。

contents.text: IPv6 Address: The IPv6 address listening on the modem.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv6地址：在调制解调器上侦听的IPv6地址。

contents.text: TCP Port Number: TCP port number on the modem.
contents.zh-CHS: TCP端口号：调制解调器上的TCP端口号。

contents.text: If the Length field is 19, the port number specified MUST be used to establish the TCP session. If the TCP Port Number is omitted, i.e., the Length field is 17, the router MUST use the DLEP well-known port number (Section 15.14) to establish the TCP connection.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果长度字段为19，则必须使用指定的端口号来建立TCP会话。如果省略TCP端口号，即长度字段为17，则路由器必须使用DLEP已知端口号（第15.14节）来建立TCP连接。

contents.text: The Flags field is defined as:
contents.zh-CHS: 标志字段定义为：

contents.text: T: Use TLS flag, indicating whether the TCP connection to the given address and port requires the use of TLS [RFC5246] (1) or not (0).
contents.zh-CHS: T:使用TLS标志，指示到给定地址和端口的TCP连接是否需要使用TLS[RFC5246]（1）或（0）。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be zero. Left for future assignment.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须为零。留作将来的任务。

contents.text: 13.4. Peer Type
contents.zh-CHS: 13.4. 对等类型

contents.text: The Peer Type Data Item is used by the router and modem to give additional information as to its type and the properties of the over-the-air control plane.
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器和调制解调器使用对等类型数据项提供有关其类型和空中控制平面属性的附加信息。

contents.text: With some devices, access to the shared RF medium is strongly controlled. One example of this would be satellite modems -- where protocols, proprietary in nature, have been developed to ensure that a given modem has authorization to connect to the shared medium. Another example of this class of modems is governmental/military devices, where elaborate mechanisms have been developed to ensure that only authorized devices can connect to the shared medium. Contrasting with the above, there are modems where no such access control is used. An example of this class of modem would be one that supports the 802.11 ad hoc mode of operation. The Secured Medium (S) flag is used to indicate if access control is in place.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于某些设备，对共享射频介质的访问受到严格控制。其中一个例子是卫星调制解调器——在这种情况下，已经开发出了具有专有性质的协议，以确保给定的调制解调器具有连接到共享介质的授权。这类调制解调器的另一个例子是政府/军事设备，在这些设备中，已经开发了复杂的机制，以确保只有授权设备才能连接到共享介质。与上述情况相反，有些调制解调器不使用这种访问控制。此类调制解调器的一个示例是支持802.11自组织操作模式的调制解调器。安全介质标志用于指示访问控制是否到位。

contents.text: The Peer Type Data Item includes a textual description of the peer; it is envisioned that the text will be used for informational purposes (e.g., as output in a display command).
contents.zh-CHS: 对等类型数据项包括对等的文本描述；预计文本将用于信息目的（例如，作为显示命令中的输出）。

contents.text: The Peer Type Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 对等类型数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：4

contents.text: Length: 1 + Length of Description, in octets.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1+描述长度，以八位字节为单位。

contents.text: Flags: Flags field, defined below.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志：标志字段，定义如下。

contents.text: Description: UTF-8 encoded string of Unicode [RFC3629] characters. For example, a satellite modem might set this variable to "Satellite terminal". Since this Data Item is intended to provide additional information for display commands, sending implementations SHOULD limit the data to printable characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 描述：Unicode[RFC3629]字符的UTF-8编码字符串。例如，卫星调制解调器可能会将此变量设置为“卫星终端”。由于此数据项旨在为显示命令提供附加信息，因此发送实现应将数据限制为可打印字符。

contents.text: An implementation MUST NOT assume that the Description field is a NUL-terminated string of printable characters.
contents.zh-CHS: 实现不能假定描述字段是以NUL结尾的可打印字符字符串。

contents.text: The Flags field is defined as:
contents.zh-CHS: 标志字段定义为：

contents.text: S: Secured Medium flag, used by a modem to indicate whether the shared RF medium implements access control (1) or not (0). The Secured Medium flag only has meaning in Signals and Messages sent by a modem.
contents.zh-CHS: S：安全介质标志，由调制解调器用于指示共享射频介质是否实现访问控制（1）或（0）。安全介质标志仅在调制解调器发送的信号和消息中有意义。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be zero. Left for future assignment.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须为零。留作将来的任务。

contents.text: 13.5. Heartbeat Interval
contents.zh-CHS: 13.5. 心跳间隔

contents.text: The Heartbeat Interval Data Item is used to specify a period in milliseconds for Heartbeat Messages (Section 12.20).
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳间隔数据项用于指定心跳消息的周期（以毫秒为单位）（第12.20节）。

contents.text: The Heartbeat Interval Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 心跳间隔数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 5
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：5

contents.text: Length: 4
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：4

contents.text: Heartbeat Interval: The interval in milliseconds, expressed as a 32-bit unsigned integer, for Heartbeat Messages. This value MUST NOT be 0.
contents.zh-CHS: Heartbeat Interval：心跳消息的间隔（以毫秒为单位），表示为32位无符号整数。此值不能为0。

contents.text: As mentioned before, receipt of any valid DLEP Message MUST reset the heartbeat interval timer (i.e., valid DLEP Messages take the place of, and obviate the need for, additional Heartbeat Messages).
contents.zh-CHS: 如前所述，收到任何有效的DLEP消息都必须重置心跳间隔计时器（即，有效的DLEP消息取代并消除对额外心跳消息的需要）。

contents.text: 13.6. Extensions Supported
contents.zh-CHS: 13.6. 支持的扩展

contents.text: The Extensions Supported Data Item is used by the router and modem to negotiate additional optional functionality they are willing to support. The Extensions List is a concatenation of the types of each supported extension, found in the IANA registry titled "Extension Type Values". Each Extension Type definition includes which additional Signals and Data Items are supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 路由器和调制解调器使用扩展支持的数据项协商它们愿意支持的其他可选功能。扩展列表是每个受支持扩展类型的串联，可在标题为“扩展类型值”的IANA注册表中找到。每个扩展类型定义包括支持哪些附加信号和数据项。

contents.text: The Extensions Supported Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 支持的扩展数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 6
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：6

contents.text: Length: Length of the Extensions List in octets. This is twice (2x) the number of extensions.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：扩展列表的长度（以八位字节为单位）。这是扩展数量的两倍。

contents.text: Extensions List: A list of extensions supported, identified by their 2-octet values as listed in the "Extension Type Values" registry.
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展列表：支持的扩展列表，由“扩展类型值”注册表中列出的2个八位字节值标识。

contents.text: 13.7. MAC Address
contents.zh-CHS: 13.7. MAC地址

contents.text: The MAC Address Data Item contains the address of the destination on the remote node.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址数据项包含远程节点上的目标地址。

contents.text: DLEP can support MAC addresses in either EUI-48 or EUI-64 format ("EUI" stands for "Extended Unique Identifier"), with the restriction that all MAC addresses for a given DLEP session MUST be in the same format and MUST be consistent with the MAC address format of the connected modem (e.g., if the modem is connected to the router with an EUI-48 MAC, all destination addresses via that modem MUST be expressed in EUI-48 format).
contents.zh-CHS: DLEP可以支持EUI-48或EUI-64格式的MAC地址（“EUI”代表“扩展唯一标识符”），但限制条件是给定DLEP会话的所有MAC地址必须采用相同的格式，并且必须与所连接调制解调器的MAC地址格式一致（例如，如果调制解调器通过EUI-48 MAC连接到路由器，则通过该调制解调器的所有目标地址必须以EUI-48格式表示）。

contents.text: Examples of a virtual destination would be (1) a multicast MAC address or (2) the broadcast MAC address (FF:FF:FF:FF:FF:FF).
contents.zh-CHS: 虚拟目的地的示例为（1）多播MAC地址或（2）广播MAC地址（FF:FF:FF:FF:FF）。

contents.text: Data Item Type: 7
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：7

contents.text: Length: 6 for EUI-48 format or 8 for EUI-64 format.
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：EUI-48格式为6，EUI-64格式为8。

contents.text: MAC Address: MAC address of the destination.
contents.zh-CHS: MAC地址：目的地的MAC地址。

contents.text: 13.8. IPv4 Address
contents.zh-CHS: 13.8. IPv4地址

contents.text: When included in the Session Update Message, this Data Item contains the IPv4 address of the peer. When included in Destination Messages, this Data Item contains the IPv4 address of the destination. In either case, the Data Item also contains an indication of whether this is (1) a new or existing address or (2) a deletion of a previously known address.
contents.zh-CHS: 当包含在会话更新消息中时，此数据项包含对等方的IPv4地址。当包含在目标消息中时，此数据项包含目标的IPv4地址。在这两种情况下，数据项还包含以下指示：（1）新地址还是现有地址，或（2）删除先前已知的地址。

contents.text: The IPv4 Address Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4地址数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：8

contents.text: Length: 5
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：5

contents.text: Flags: Flags field, defined below.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志：标志字段，定义如下。

contents.text: IPv4 Address: The IPv4 address of the destination or peer.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4地址：目标或对等方的IPv4地址。

contents.text: The Flags field is defined as:
contents.zh-CHS: 标志字段定义为：

contents.text: A: Add/Drop flag, indicating whether this is a new or existing address (1) or a withdrawal of an address (0).
contents.zh-CHS: A:添加/删除标志，指示这是新地址还是现有地址（1）或地址的撤消（0）。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be zero. Reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须为零。保留供将来使用。

contents.text: 13.8.1. IPv4 Address Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 13.8.1. IPv4地址处理

contents.text: Processing of the IPv4 Address Data Item MUST be done within the context of the DLEP peer session on which it is presented.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4地址数据项的处理必须在其所在的DLEP对等会话的上下文中完成。

contents.text: The handling of erroneous or logically inconsistent conditions depends upon the type of the message that contains the Data Item, as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 错误或逻辑不一致条件的处理取决于包含数据项的消息类型，如下所示：

contents.text: If the containing message is a Session Message, e.g., a Session Initialization Message (Section 12.5) or Session Update Message (Section 12.7), the receiver of inconsistent information MUST issue a Session Termination Message (Section 12.9) containing a Status Data Item (Section 13.1) with status code set to 130 'Invalid Data' and transition to the Session Termination state. Examples of such conditions are:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果包含的消息是会话消息，例如会话初始化消息（第12.5节）或会话更新消息（第12.7节），则不一致信息的接收方必须发出包含状态数据项（第13.1节）的会话终止消息（第12.9节）状态代码设置为130“无效数据”，并转换为会话终止状态。这些情况的例子如下：

contents.text: o An address Drop operation referencing an address that is not associated with the peer in the current session.
contents.zh-CHS: o 引用与当前会话中的对等方不关联的地址的地址删除操作。

contents.text: o An address Add operation referencing an address that has already been added to the peer in the current session.
contents.zh-CHS: o 引用已在当前会话中添加到对等方的地址的地址添加操作。

contents.text: If the containing message is a Destination Message, e.g., a Destination Up Message (Section 12.11) or Destination Update Message (Section 12.17), the receiver of inconsistent information MAY issue the appropriate response message containing a Status Data Item with status code set to 3 'Inconsistent Data' but MUST continue with session processing. Examples of such conditions are:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果包含的消息是目的地消息，例如，目的地上行消息（第12.11节）或目的地更新消息（第12.17节），则不一致信息的接收方可发出包含状态代码设置为3“不一致数据”的状态数据项的适当响应消息，但必须继续进行会话处理。这些情况的例子如下：

contents.text: o An address Add operation referencing an address that has already been added to the destination in the current session.
contents.zh-CHS: o 地址添加操作，引用已在当前会话中添加到目标的地址。

contents.text: o An address Add operation referencing an address that is associated with a different destination or the peer in the current session.
contents.zh-CHS: o 地址添加操作，引用与当前会话中的其他目标或对等方关联的地址。

contents.text: o An address Add operation referencing an address that makes no sense -- for example, defined as not forwardable in [RFC6890].
contents.zh-CHS: o 一种地址添加操作，引用一个毫无意义的地址——例如，在[RFC6890]中定义为不可转发。

contents.text: o An address Drop operation referencing an address that is not associated with the destination in the current session.
contents.zh-CHS: o 引用与当前会话中的目标不关联的地址的地址删除操作。

contents.text: If no response message is appropriate -- for example, the Destination Update Message -- then the implementation MUST continue with session processing.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果没有合适的响应消息（例如，目标更新消息），那么实现必须继续进行会话处理。

contents.text: Modems that do not track IPv4 addresses MUST silently ignore IPv4 Address Data Items.
contents.zh-CHS: 不跟踪IPv4地址的调制解调器必须以静默方式忽略IPv4地址数据项。

contents.zh-CHS: 13.9. IPv6地址

When included in Destination Messages, this Data Item contains the IPv6 address of the destination. contents.zh-CHS: IPv6地址数据项的处理必须在其所在的DLEP对等会话的上下文中完成。

contents.text: 13.10. IPv4 Attached Subnet
contents.zh-CHS: 13.10. IPv4连接子网

contents.text: The DLEP IPv4 Attached Subnet Data Item allows a device to declare that it has an IPv4 subnet (e.g., a stub network) attached, that it has become aware of an IPv4 subnet being present at a remote destination, or that it has become aware of the loss of a subnet at the remote destination.
contents.zh-CHS: DLEP IPv4附加子网数据项允许设备声明其已附加IPv4子网（例如存根网络），它已意识到远程目标上存在IPv4子网，或者它已意识到远程目标上的子网丢失。

contents.text: The DLEP IPv4 Attached Subnet Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: DLEP IPv4连接的子网数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 10
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：10

contents.text: Length: 6
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：6

contents.text: Flags: Flags field, defined below.
contents.zh-CHS: 标志：标志字段，定义如下。

contents.text: IPv4 Attached Subnet: The IPv4 subnet reachable at the destination.
contents.zh-CHS: IPv4连接的子网：可在目标位置访问的IPv4子网。

contents.text: Prefix Length: Length of the prefix (0-32) for the IPv4 subnet. A prefix length outside the specified range MUST be considered as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 前缀长度：IPv4子网的前缀长度（0-32）。超出指定范围的前缀长度必须视为无效。

contents.text: The Flags field is defined as:
contents.zh-CHS: 标志字段定义为：

contents.text: A: Add/Drop flag, indicating whether this is a new or existing subnet address (1) or a withdrawal of a subnet address (0).
contents.zh-CHS: A：添加/删除标志，指示这是新的或现有的子网地址（1）还是子网地址（0）的撤消。

contents.text: Reserved: MUST be zero. Reserved for future use.
contents.zh-CHS: 保留：必须为零。保留供将来使用。

contents.text: 13.10.1. IPv4 Attached Subnet Processing
contents.zh-CHS: 13.10.1. IPv4连接子网处理

contents.zh-CHS: IPv4连接的子网数据项的处理必须在其所在的DLEP对等会话的上下文中完成。

Examples of such conditions are:

contents.text: 13.12. Maximum Data Rate (Receive)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.12. 最大数据速率（接收）

contents.text: The Maximum Data Rate (Receive) (MDRR) Data Item is used to indicate the maximum theoretical data rate, in bits per second (bps), that can be achieved while receiving data on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大数据速率（接收）（MDRR）数据项用于指示在链路上接收数据时可以达到的最大理论数据速率，单位为比特/秒（bps）。

contents.text: The Maximum Data Rate (Receive) Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 最大数据速率（接收）数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 12
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：12

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Maximum Data Rate (Receive): A 64-bit unsigned integer, representing the maximum theoretical data rate, in bits per second, that can be achieved while receiving on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大数据速率（接收）：一个64位无符号整数，表示链路上接收时可以达到的最大理论数据速率，单位为位/秒。

contents.text: 13.13. Maximum Data Rate (Transmit)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.13. 最大数据速率（传输）

contents.text: The Maximum Data Rate (Transmit) (MDRT) Data Item is used to indicate the maximum theoretical data rate, in bits per second, that can be achieved while transmitting data on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大数据速率（传输）（MDRT）数据项用于指示在链路上传输数据时可以达到的最大理论数据速率，单位为比特/秒。

contents.text: The Maximum Data Rate (Transmit) Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 最大数据速率（传输）数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 13
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：13

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Maximum Data Rate (Transmit): A 64-bit unsigned integer, representing the maximum theoretical data rate, in bits per second, that can be achieved while transmitting on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大数据速率（传输）：一个64位无符号整数，表示在链路上传输时可以达到的最大理论数据速率，单位为比特/秒。

contents.text: 13.14. Current Data Rate (Receive)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.14. 当前数据速率（接收）

contents.text: The Current Data Rate (Receive) (CDRR) Data Item is used to indicate the rate at which the link is currently operating for receiving traffic.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前数据速率（接收）（CDRR）数据项用于指示链路当前用于接收流量的速率。

contents.text: When used in the Link Characteristics Request Message (Section 12.18), Current Data Rate (Receive) represents the desired receive rate, in bits per second, on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 当在链路特性请求消息（第12.18节）中使用时，当前数据速率（Receive）表示链路上的期望接收速率，单位为比特/秒。

contents.text: The Current Data Rate (Receive) Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 当前数据速率（接收）数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 14
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：14

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Current Data Rate (Receive): A 64-bit unsigned integer, representing the current data rate, in bits per second, that can currently be achieved while receiving traffic on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前数据速率（Receive）：一个64位无符号整数，表示当前数据速率（以位/秒为单位），当前在链路上接收流量时可以实现该速率。

contents.text: If there is no distinction between Current Data Rate (Receive) and Maximum Data Rate (Receive) (Section 13.12), Current Data Rate (Receive) MUST be set equal to Maximum Data Rate (Receive). Current Data Rate (Receive) MUST NOT exceed Maximum Data Rate (Receive).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果当前数据速率（接收）和最大数据速率（接收）之间没有区别（第13.12节），则当前数据速率（接收）必须设置为等于最大数据速率（接收）。当前数据速率（接收）不得超过最大数据速率（接收）。

contents.text: 13.15. Current Data Rate (Transmit)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.15. 当前数据速率（传输）

contents.text: The Current Data Rate (Transmit) (CDRT) Data Item is used to indicate the rate at which the link is currently operating for transmitting traffic.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前数据速率（传输）（CDRT）数据项用于指示链路当前用于传输业务的速率。

contents.text: When used in the Link Characteristics Request Message (Section 12.18), Current Data Rate (Transmit) represents the desired transmit rate, in bits per second, on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 当在链路特性请求消息（第12.18节）中使用时，当前数据速率（传输）表示链路上的期望传输速率，单位为比特/秒。

contents.text: The Current Data Rate (Transmit) Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 当前数据速率（传输）数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 15
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：15

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Current Data Rate (Transmit): A 64-bit unsigned integer, representing the current data rate, in bits per second, that can currently be achieved while transmitting traffic on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 当前数据速率（传输）：一个64位无符号整数，表示当前数据速率（以位/秒为单位），当前在链路上传输流量时可以达到该速率。

contents.text: If there is no distinction between Current Data Rate (Transmit) and Maximum Data Rate (Transmit) (Section 13.13), Current Data Rate (Transmit) MUST be set equal to Maximum Data Rate (Transmit). Current Data Rate (Transmit) MUST NOT exceed Maximum Data Rate (Transmit).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果当前数据速率（传输）和最大数据速率（传输）（第13.13节）之间没有区别，则当前数据速率（传输）必须设置为等于最大数据速率（传输）。当前数据速率（传输）不得超过最大数据速率（传输）。

contents.text: 13.16. Latency
The Latency Data Item is used to indicate the amount of latency, in microseconds, on the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 延迟数据项用于指示链路上的延迟量（以微秒为单位）。

contents.text: The Latency value is reported as transmission delay. The calculation of latency is implementation dependent. For example, the latency may be a running average calculated from the internal queuing.
contents.zh-CHS: 延迟值报告为传输延迟。延迟的计算取决于实现。例如，延迟可以是从内部队列计算的运行平均值。

contents.text: The Latency Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 延迟数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 16
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：16

contents.text: Length: 8
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：8

contents.text: Latency: A 64-bit unsigned integer, representing the transmission delay, in microseconds, that a packet encounters as it is transmitted over the link.
contents.zh-CHS: 延迟：64位无符号整数，表示数据包在链路上传输时遇到的传输延迟（以微秒为单位）。

contents.text: 13.17. Resources

The Resources (RES) Data Item is used to indicate the amount of finite resources available for data transmission and reception at the destination as a percentage, with 0 meaning 'no resources remaining' and 100 meaning 'a full supply', assuming that when Resources reaches 0 data transmission and/or reception will cease.
contents.zh-CHS: 资源（RES）数据项用于以百分比表示目的地可用于数据传输和接收的有限资源量，0表示“无剩余资源”，100表示“完全供应”，假设资源达到0时，数据传输和/或接收将停止。

contents.text: An example of such resources is battery life, but this could also include resources such as available memory for queuing, or CPU idle percentage. The specific criteria to be used for this metric is out of scope for this specification and is implementation specific.
contents.zh-CHS: 此类资源的一个例子是电池寿命，但这也可能包括资源，如用于排队的可用内存或CPU空闲百分比。用于此度量的特定标准超出了本规范的范围，并且是特定于实现的。

contents.text: This Data Item is designed to be used as an indication of some capability of the modem and/or router at the destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 此数据项设计用于指示目的地的调制解调器和/或路由器的某些功能。

contents.text: The Resources Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 资源数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 17
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：17

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Resources: An 8-bit unsigned integer percentage, 0-100, representing the amount of resources available. Any value greater than 100 MUST be considered as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 资源：8位无符号整数百分比，0-100，表示可用资源量。任何大于100的值都必须视为无效。

contents.text: If a device cannot calculate Resources, this Data Item MUST NOT be issued.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设备无法计算资源，则不得发布此数据项。

contents.text: 13.18. Relative Link Quality (Receive)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.18. 相对链路质量（接收）

contents.text: The Relative Link Quality (Receive) (RLQR) Data Item is used to indicate the quality of the link to a destination for receiving traffic, with 0 meaning 'worst quality' and 100 meaning 'best quality'.
contents.zh-CHS: 相对链路质量（接收）（RLQR）数据项用于指示到接收流量目的地的链路质量，0表示“最差质量”，100表示“最佳质量”。

contents.text: Quality in this context is defined as an indication of the stability of a link for reception; a destination with high Relative Link Quality (Receive) is expected to have generally stable DLEP metrics, and the metrics of a destination with low Relative Link Quality (Receive) can be expected to rapidly fluctuate over a wide range.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，质量被定义为接收链路稳定性的指示；具有高相对链路质量（Receive）的目的地预期具有通常稳定的DLEP度量，并且具有低相对链路质量（Receive）的目的地的度量可预期在宽范围内快速波动。

contents.text: The Relative Link Quality (Receive) Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 相对链接质量（接收）数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 18
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：18

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Relative Link Quality (Receive): A non-dimensional unsigned 8-bit integer, 0-100, representing relative quality of the link for receiving traffic. Any value greater than 100 MUST be considered as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 相对链路质量（Receive）：一个无量纲无符号8位整数，0-100，表示接收流量的链路的相对质量。任何大于100的值都必须视为无效。

contents.text: If a device cannot calculate Relative Link Quality (Receive), this Data Item MUST NOT be issued.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设备无法计算相对链路质量（接收），则不得发布此数据项。

contents.text: 13.19. Relative Link Quality (Transmit)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.19. 相对链路质量（传输）

contents.text: The Relative Link Quality (Transmit) (RLQT) Data Item is used to indicate the quality of the link to a destination for transmitting traffic, with 0 meaning 'worst quality' and 100 meaning 'best quality'.
contents.zh-CHS: 相对链路质量（传输）（RLQT）数据项用于指示到传输业务目的地的链路质量，0表示“最差质量”，100表示“最佳质量”。

contents.text: Quality in this context is defined as an indication of the stability of a link for transmission; a destination with high Relative Link Quality (Transmit) is expected to have generally stable DLEP metrics, and the metrics of a destination with low Relative Link Quality (Transmit) can be expected to rapidly fluctuate over a wide range.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这种情况下，质量被定义为传输链路稳定性的指示；具有高相对链路质量（传输）的目的地预期具有通常稳定的DLEP度量，并且具有低相对链路质量（传输）的目的地的度量可以预期在宽范围内快速波动。

contents.text: The Relative Link Quality (Transmit) Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 相对链路质量（传输）数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 19
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：19

contents.text: Length: 1
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：1

contents.text: Relative Link Quality (Transmit): A non-dimensional unsigned 8-bit integer, 0-100, representing relative quality of the link for transmitting traffic. Any value greater than 100 MUST be considered as invalid.
contents.zh-CHS: 相对链路质量（传输）：无量纲无符号8位整数，0-100，表示传输流量的链路的相对质量。任何大于100的值都必须视为无效。

contents.text: If a device cannot calculate Relative Link Quality (Transmit), this Data Item MUST NOT be issued.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设备无法计算相对链路质量（传输），则不得发布此数据项。

contents.text: 13.20. Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.20. 最大传输单位（MTU）

contents.text: The Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) Data Item is used to indicate the maximum size, in octets, of an IP packet that can be transmitted without fragmentation, including headers, but excluding any lower-layer headers.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大传输单元（MTU）数据项用于指示可以在不分段的情况下传输的IP数据包的最大大小（以八位字节为单位），包括报头，但不包括任何较低层报头。

contents.text: The Maximum Transmission Unit Data Item contains the following fields:
contents.zh-CHS: 最大传输单位数据项包含以下字段：

contents.text: Data Item Type: 20
contents.zh-CHS: 数据项类型：20

contents.text: Length: 2
contents.zh-CHS: 长度：2

contents.text: Maximum Transmission Unit: The maximum size, in octets, of an IP packet that can be transmitted without fragmentation, including headers, but excluding any lower-layer headers.
contents.zh-CHS: 最大传输单位：一个IP数据包的最大大小，以八位字节为单位，可以在没有碎片的情况下传输，包括报头，但不包括任何较低层的报头。

contents.text: If a device cannot calculate Maximum Transmission Unit, this Data Item MUST NOT be issued.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果设备无法计算最大传输单位，则不得发布此数据项。

contents.text: 14. Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 14. 安全考虑

contents.text: The potential security concerns when using DLEP are as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用DLEP时的潜在安全问题如下：

contents.text: 1. An attacker might pretend to be a DLEP participant, either at DLEP session initialization or by injection of DLEP Messages once a session has been established.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 攻击者可以在DLEP会话初始化时或在会话建立后通过注入DLEP消息假装为DLEP参与者。

contents.text: 2. DLEP Data Items could be altered by an attacker, causing the receiving implementation to inappropriately alter its information base concerning network status.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 攻击者可以更改DLEP数据项，从而导致接收实现不适当地更改其有关网络状态的信息库。

contents.text: 3. An attacker could join an unsecured radio network and inject over-the-air signals that maliciously influence the information reported by a DLEP modem, causing a router to forward traffic to an inappropriate destination.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 攻击者可以加入不安全的无线网络，并通过空中注入信号，恶意影响DLEP调制解调器报告的信息，从而导致路由器将流量转发到不适当的目的地。

contents.text: The implications of attacks on DLEP peers are directly proportional to the extent to which DLEP data is used within the control plane. While the use of DLEP data in other control-plane components is out of scope for this document, as an example, if DLEP statistics are incorporated into route cost calculations, adversaries masquerading as a DLEP peer and injecting malicious data via DLEP could cause suboptimal route selection, adversely impacting network performance. Similar issues can arise if DLEP data is used as an input to policing algorithms -- injection of malicious data via DLEP can cause those policing algorithms to make incorrect decisions, degrading network throughput.
contents.zh-CHS: 攻击DLEP对等点的影响与控制平面内使用DLEP数据的程度成正比。虽然在其他控制平面组件中使用DLEP数据超出了本文件的范围，但例如，如果将DLEP统计数据纳入路由成本计算，则伪装为DLEP对等方并通过DLEP注入恶意数据的对手可能会导致次优路由选择，从而对网络性能产生不利影响。如果将DLEP数据用作监控算法的输入，也会出现类似的问题——通过DLEP注入恶意数据会导致监控算法做出错误决策，从而降低网络吞吐量。

contents.text: For these reasons, security of the DLEP transport must be considered at both the transport layer and Layer 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 由于这些原因，必须在传输层和第2层同时考虑DLEP传输的安全性。

contents.text: At the transport layer, when TLS is in use, each peer SHOULD check the validity of credentials presented by the other peer during TLS session establishment. Implementations following the "dedicated deployments" model attempting to use TLS MAY (1) need to consider the use of pre-shared keys for credentials, (2) provide specialized techniques for peer identity validation, and (3) refer to [RFC5487] for additional details. Implementations following the "networked deployment" model described in "Implementation Scenarios" (Section 4) SHOULD refer to [RFC7525] for additional details.
contents.zh-CHS: 在传输层，当使用TLS时，每个对等方应在TLS会话建立期间检查另一对等方提供的凭据的有效性。遵循“专用部署”模型尝试使用TLS的实现可以（1）考虑使用预共享密钥来进行凭证，（2）提供用于对等体身份验证的专门技术，和（3）参考[RCF587]以获得额外的细节。按照“实施方案”（第4节）中所述的“网络部署”模型实施，有关更多详细信息，请参阅[RFC7525]。

contents.text: At Layer 2, since DLEP is restricted to operation over a single (possibly logical) hop, implementations SHOULD also secure the Layer 2 link. Examples of technologies that can be deployed to secure the Layer 2 link include [IEEE-802.1AE] and [IEEE-802.1X].
contents.zh-CHS: 在第2层，由于DLEP仅限于在单个（可能是逻辑）跃点上进行操作，因此实现还应确保第2层链路的安全。可用于保护第2层链路的技术示例包括[IEEE-802.1AE]和[IEEE-802.1X]。

contents.text: By examining the Secured Medium flag in the Peer Type Data Item (Section 13.4), a router can decide if it is able to trust the information supplied via a DLEP modem. If this is not the case, then the router SHOULD consider restricting the size of attached subnets, announced in IPv4 Attached Subnet Data Items (Section 13.10) and/or IPv6 Attached Subnet Data Items (Section 13.11), that are considered for route selection.
contents.zh-CHS: 通过检查对等类型数据项中的安全介质标志（第13.4节），路由器可以决定是否能够信任通过DLEP调制解调器提供的信息。如果情况不是这样，那么路由器应该考虑限制在IPv4附加子网数据项（第13.10节）和/或IPv6附加子网数据项（第13.11节）中所宣布的附加子网的大小，这被认为是路由选择。

contents.text: To avoid potential denial-of-service attacks, it is RECOMMENDED that implementations using the Peer Discovery mechanism (1) maintain an information base of hosts that persistently fail Session Initialization, even though those hosts have provided an acceptable Peer Discovery Signal and (2) ignore any subsequent Peer Discovery Signals from such hosts.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免潜在的拒绝服务攻击，建议使用对等发现机制的实现（1）维护会话初始化持续失败的主机的信息库，即使这些主机提供了可接受的对等发现信号（2）忽略来自此类主机的任何后续对等发现信号。

contents.text: This specification does not address security of the data plane, as it (the data plane) is not affected, and standard security procedures can be employed.
contents.zh-CHS: 本规范不涉及数据平面的安全性，因为它（数据平面）不受影响，可以采用标准的安全程序。

contents.text: 15. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 15. IANA考虑

contents.text: 15.1. Registrations
IANA has created a new protocol registry for the Dynamic Link Exchange Protocol (DLEP). The remainder of this section details the new DLEP-specific registries.
contents.zh-CHS: IANA为动态链路交换协议（DLEP）创建了一个新的协议注册表。本节的其余部分详细介绍了新的特定于DLEP的注册表。

contents.text: 15.2. Signal Type Registrations
contents.zh-CHS: 15.2. 信号类型注册

contents.text: IANA has created a new DLEP registry, named "Signal Type Values".
contents.zh-CHS: IANA创建了一个新的DLEP注册表，名为“信号类型值”。

contents.text: The following table provides initial registry values and the policies, as defined by [RFC5226], that apply to the registry:
contents.zh-CHS: 下表提供了适用于注册表的初始注册表值和[RFC5226]定义的策略：

contents.text: 15.3. Message Type Registrations
contents.zh-CHS: 15.3. 消息类型注册

contents.text: IANA has created a new DLEP registry, named "Message Type Values".
contents.zh-CHS: IANA创建了一个新的DLEP注册表，名为“消息类型值”。

contents.text: The following table provides initial registry values and the policies, as defined by [RFC5226], that apply to the registry:
contents.zh-CHS: 下表提供了适用于注册表的初始注册表值和[RFC5226]定义的策略：

|              |                                          |

|              |                                          |

|              |                                          |
| 5            | Session Termination Message              |
|              |                                          |
| 6            | Session Termination Response Message     |
|              |                                          |
| 7            | Destination Up Message                   |
|              |                                          |

|              |                                          |
| 10           | Destination Announce Response Message    |
|              |                                          |
| 11           | Destination Down Message                 |
|              |                                          |

| 12           | Destination Down Response Message        |

| 13           | Destination Update Message               |

15.4. DLEP Data Item Registrations
contents.zh-CHS: 15.4. 数据项注册

contents.text: IANA has created a new DLEP registry, named "Data Item Type Values".
contents.zh-CHS: IANA创建了一个新的DLEP注册表，名为“数据项类型值”。

contents.text: The following table provides initial registry values and the policies, as defined by [RFC5226], that apply to the registry:
contents.zh-CHS: 下表提供了适用于注册表的初始注册表值和[RFC5226]定义的策略：

contents.text:

| Status Code  | Failure Mode  | Description/Policy                 |

| 0            | Continue      | Success                            |

| 1            | Continue      | Not Interested                     |
|              |               |                                    |
| 2            | Continue      | Request Denied                     |
|              |               |                                    |

|              |               |                                    |
| 4-111        | Continue      | Unassigned / Specification         |
|              |               | Required                           |

|              |               |                                    |
| 112-127      | Continue      | Private Use                        |
|              |               |                                    |
| 128          | Terminate     | Unknown Message                    |
|              |               |                                    |
| 129          | Terminate     | Unexpected Message                 |
|              |               |                                    |
| 130          | Terminate     | Invalid Data                       |
|              |               |                                    |
| 131          | Terminate     | Invalid Destination                |
|              |               |                                    |
| 132          | Terminate     | Timed Out                          |
|              |               |                                    |
| 133-239      | Terminate     | Unassigned / Specification         |
|              |               | Required                           |
|              |               |                                    |
| 240-254      | Terminate     | Reserved for Private Use           |
|              |               |                                    |
| 255          | Terminate     | Shutting Down                      |
+--------------+---------------+------------------------------------+

contents.text: Appendix A. Discovery Signal Flows
contents.zh-CHS: 附录A.发现信号流

contents.text:
|                                     Router initiates discovery,
|                                     starts a timer, sends Peer
|-------Peer Discovery---->X          Discovery Signal.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Router discovery timer expires without receiving Peer Offer.
contents.zh-CHS: ~~~~~~~路由器发现计时器在未收到对等方提供的情况下过期。

contents.text:
|                                     Router sends another Peer
|-------Peer Discovery---------->|    Discovery Signal.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem receives Peer Discovery
                                 |    Signal.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem sends Peer Offer with
|<--------Peer Offer-------------|    Connection Point information.
:
:                                     Router MAY cancel discovery timer
:                                     and stop sending Peer Discovery
:                                     Signals.
Appendix B. Peer-Level Message Flows
contents.zh-CHS: 附录B.对等级消息流

contents.text: B.1. Session Initialization
contents.zh-CHS: B.1. 会话初始化

contents.text:
|                                     Router connects to discovered or
|                                     preconfigured Modem Connection
|--TCP connection established--->     Point.
|
|                                     Router sends Session
|----Session Initialization----->|    Initialization Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem receives Session
                                 |    Initialization Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem sends Session Initialization
|<--Session Initialization Resp.-|    Response with 'Success' Status
|                                |    Data Item.
|                                |
|<<============================>>|    Session established.
:                                :    Heartbeats begin.
B.2. Session Initialization - Refused
contents.zh-CHS: B.2. 会话初始化-拒绝

contents.text:
|                                     Router connects to discovered or
|                                     preconfigured Modem Connection
|--TCP connection established--->     Point.
|
|                                     Router sends Session
|-----Session Initialization---->|    Initialization Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem receives Session
                                 |    Initialization Message and
                                 |    will not support the advertised
                                 |    extensions.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem sends Session Initialization
                                 |    Response with 'Request Denied'
|<-Session Initialization Resp.--|    Status Data Item.
|
|
|                                     Router receives negative Session
|                                     Initialization Response, closes
||---------TCP close------------||    TCP connection.
B.3. Router Changes IP Addresses
contents.zh-CHS: B.3. 路由器更改IP地址

contents.text:
|                                     Router sends Session Update
|-------Session Update---------->|    Message to announce change of
                                 |    IP address.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem receives Session Update
                                 |    Message and updates internal
                                 |    state.
                                 |
|<----Session Update Response----|    Modem sends Session Update
                                 |    Response.
B.4. Modem Changes Session-Wide Metrics
contents.zh-CHS: B.4. 调制解调器更改会话范围度量

contents.text:
|    Modem sends Session Update Message
                                 |    to announce change of session-wide
|<--------Session Update---------|    metrics.
|
|                                     Router receives Session Update
|                                     Message and updates internal
|                                     state.
|
|----Session Update Response---->|    Router sends Session Update
                                 |    Response.
B.5. Router Terminates Session
contents.zh-CHS: B.5. 路由器终止会话

contents.text:
|                                     Router sends Session Termination
|------Session Termination------>|    Message with Status Data Item.
|                                |
|-------TCP shutdown (send)--->  |    Router stops sending Messages.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem receives Session
                                 |    Termination, stops counting
                                 |    received heartbeats, and stops
                                 |    sending heartbeats.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem sends Session Termination
|<---Session Termination Resp.---|    Response with Status 'Success'.
|
|                                     Modem stops sending Messages.
|
||---------TCP close------------||    Session terminated.
B.6. Modem Terminates Session
contents.zh-CHS: B.6. 调制解调器终止会话

contents.text:
|    Modem sends Session Termination
|<----Session Termination--------|    Message with Status Data Item.
|
|                                     Modem stops sending Messages.
|
|                                     Router receives Session
|                                     Termination, stops counting
|                                     received heartbeats, and stops
|                                     sending heartbeats.
|
|                                     Router sends Session Termination
|---Session Termination Resp.--->|    Response with Status 'Success'.
                                 |
                                 |    Router stops sending Messages.
                                 |
||---------TCP close------------||    Session terminated.
B.7. Session Heartbeats
contents.zh-CHS: B.7. 会话心跳

contents.text:
|----------Heartbeat------------>|    Router sends Heartbeat Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem resets heartbeats missed
                                 |    counter.

|---------[Any Message]--------->|    When the Modem receives any
                                 |    Message from the Router.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem resets heartbeats missed
                                 |    counter.

|<---------Heartbeat-------------|    Modem sends Heartbeat Message.
|
|                                     Router resets heartbeats missed
|                                     counter.

|<--------[Any Message]----------|    When the Router receives any
|                                     Message from the Modem.
|
|                                     Modem resets heartbeats missed
|                                     counter.
B.8. Router Detects a Heartbeat Timeout
contents.zh-CHS: B.8. 路由器检测到心跳超时

contents.text: X<----------------------|    Router misses a heartbeat.

|        X<----------------------|    Router misses too many
|                                     heartbeats.
|
|
|------Session Termination------>|    Router sends Session Termination
|                                     Message with 'Timeout' Status
|                                     Data Item.
:
:                                     Termination proceeds...
B.9. Modem Detects a Heartbeat Timeout
contents.zh-CHS: B.9. 调制解调器检测到心跳超时

contents.text: |---------------------->X             Modem misses a heartbeat.

|---------------------->X        |    Modem misses too many
                                 |    heartbeats.
                                 |
                                 |
|<-----Session Termination-------|    Modem sends Session Termination
                                 |    Message with 'Timeout' Status
                                 |    Data Item.
                                 :
                                 :    Termination proceeds...
Appendix C. Destination-Specific Message Flows
contents.zh-CHS: 附录C.特定于目的地的消息流

contents.text: C.1. Common Destination Notification
contents.zh-CHS: C.1. 公共目的地通知

contents.text:
|    Modem detects a new logical
                                 |    destination is reachable and
|<-------Destination Up----------|    sends Destination Up Message.
|
|------Destination Up Resp.----->|    Router sends Destination Up
                                 |    Response.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
                                 |    Modem detects change in logical
                                 |    destination metrics and sends
|<-------Destination Update------|    Destination Update Message.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
                                 |    Modem detects change in logical
                                 |    destination metrics and sends
|<-------Destination Update------|    Destination Update Message.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
                                 |    Modem detects logical destination
                                 |    is no longer reachable and sends
|<-------Destination Down--------|    Destination Down Message.
|
|                                     Router receives Destination Down,
|                                     updates internal state, and sends
|------Destination Down Resp.--->|    Destination Down Response Message.
C.2. Multicast Destination Notification
contents.zh-CHS: C.2. 多播目的地通知

contents.text:
|                                     Router detects a new multicast
|                                     destination is in use and sends
|-----Destination Announce------>|    Destination Announce Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem updates internal state to
                                 |    monitor multicast destination and
|<-----Dest. Announce Resp.------|    sends Destination Announce
                                      Response.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
                                 |    Modem detects change in multicast
                                 |    destination metrics and sends
|<-------Destination Update------|    Destination Update Message.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
                                 |    Modem detects change in multicast
                                 |    destination metrics and sends
|<-------Destination Update------|    Destination Update Message.

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
|                                     Router detects multicast
|                                     destination is no longer in use
|--------Destination Down------->|    and sends Destination Down
                                 |    Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem receives Destination Down,
                                 |    updates internal state, and sends
|<-----Destination Down Resp.----|    Destination Down Response Message.
C.3. Link Characteristics Request
contents.zh-CHS: C.3. 链路特性请求

contents.text: Destination has already been ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ announced by either peer.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标已由任一对等方宣布。

contents.text:
|                                     Router requires different
|                                     characteristics for the
|                                     destination and sends Link
|--Link Characteristics Request->|    Characteristics Request Message.
                                 |
                                 |    Modem attempts to adjust link
                                 |    properties to meet the received
                                 |    request and sends a Link
                                 |    Characteristics Response
|<---Link Characteristics Resp.--|    Message with the new values.
